com.thesmartweb.lshrank

Class LinksParseAnalysis

    Class to analyze the urls of the results of the Search Engine APIs
    Author:
    Themistoklis Mavridis

    • Method Detail

      • perform

        public String[] perform(String[] total_links,
                        String domain,
                        String engine,
                        String example_dir,
                        String quer,
                        int nTopics,
                        double alpha,
                        double beta,
                        int niters,
                        int top_words,
                        boolean LDAflag,
                        boolean TFIDFflag,
                        String config_path)
        Method that exports the content from the urls provided and stores it in the ElasticSearch cluster of ours in a specific index and calls the Semantic Analysis algorithm selected. Until now the method exports content from: -html -youtube videos -pdf files
        Parameters:
        total_links - It contains all the links that we are going to analyze
        domain - The domain that we analyze
        engine - The search engine that we analyze the results from
        example_dir - It contains the directory where to save the results of the analysis
        quer - It contains the query for which the urls were the results for (it is used for the creation of the id in elasticsearch)
        nTopics - The number of topics for Latent Dirichlet Allocation
        alpha - The alpha value of LDA
        beta - The beta value of LDA
        niters - The number of iterations of LDA
        top_words - The amount of top words per topic to keep for LDA
        LDAflag - Flag if LDA is used
        TFIDFflag - Flag if TFIDF is used
        config_path - the path that contains the configuration files
        Returns:
        the parsed output for each url provided

      • return_topWordsTFIDF

        public List<String> return_topWordsTFIDF()
        Method to return the topWords from TFIDF
        Returns:
        topWords from TFIDF in a List
